body:
# 0.16.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_helm",
    integrity = "sha256-Eu0eaJ8HEhMAaS1qdpn+9dvE1+F1XYkH9ZlxMjdiKVI=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/releases/download/0.16.0/rules_helm-v0.16.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm


## What's Changed
* Add support for pulling charts from private OCI repos by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/188
* Support passing values files to `helm template --values` by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/187
* Fix credential helper check, fail if the helper is not found. by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/191
* Set required headers for downloading an OCI image manifest. by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/192
* Remove Windows-incompatible constraint from `//docs:rules` by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/198
* Add support for rules_img by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/200
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.35.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/201
* Release 0.16.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/202

## New Contributors
* @dependabot[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/201

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.15.0...0.16.0

# 0.15.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_helm",
    integrity = "sha256-FXofHjfR3tibhAlbbVQby1JHEdyfsX023fj7wLU7D80=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/releases/download/0.15.0/rules_helm-v0.15.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm


## What's Changed
* Updated bazelrc incompatibility flags by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/154
* Update setup directions for using MODULE.bazel by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/156
* Make chart and values attributes in helm_chart rule actually optional by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/159
* Added `chart_json` integration test by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/160
* Fix fmt.Errorf and fmt.Printf calls in runner.go by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/165
* Add missing mnemonic attribute to `symlink` function in helm_utils.bzl by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/166
* Support `substitutions` for `helm_lint_test` to specify values. by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/162
* Updated CI workers by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/182
* Switch to `windows-latest` image by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/178
* Only include `.yaml` files in `crds` by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/177
* Add new Helm versions to `versions.bzl` and switch default version to 3.18.4 by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/181
* Update `helm_import_repository` to support only specifying URL by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/176
* Remove unused `cleanArgs` variable from runner.go by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/174
* Only include supported template files in `helm_chart` by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/171
* Add `schema` field to `helm_package` by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/170
* Add `helm_template` rule to write the output from `helm template` to a file by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/175
* Remove deprecated parameter by @LM-SR in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/180
* Add support for importing a chart from an OCI registry by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/184
* Add `strict` attribute to `helm_lint_test` by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/164
* Support values files in `helm_lint_test` by @zachburg in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/168
* Bump various dependencies by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/185
* Release 0.15.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/186

## New Contributors
* @zachburg made their first contribution in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/156
* @LM-SR made their first contribution in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/180

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.14.0...0.15.0

# 0.11.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_helm",
    integrity = "sha256-msqNP9n4ql081S9Z4Ed4ummiFY3k7kM/wqJVLGgKEIc=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/releases/download/0.11.0/rules_helm-v0.11.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm


## What's Changed
* Added additional tests by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/126
* Added test for generated template files by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/127
* Cleanup docs by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/129
* Improve module extension by @mering in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/130
* Always generate exactly one toolchain by @mering in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/132
* Auto-generate documentation to reduce PR overhead by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/133
* Use Gazelle to generate targets based on go.mod by @mering in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/131
* Fix github CI by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/134
* Minor cleanup by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/135
* Bump Helm version to 3.17.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/136
* Updated buildifier by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/137
* Release 0.11.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/138
* Fix bazel-central-registry CI by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/139


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.10.0...0.11.0

## What's Changed
* Refactored `helm_install` rules to better use runfiles by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/117
* Avoid generating lock file for core rules by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/119
* Added new helm versions by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/120
* Added `helm_template_test` rule. by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/118
* Unpin Bazel version by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/121
* Release 0.10.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/122


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.9.2...0.10.0

* Improved test for helm chart deps by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/97
* Update rules_oci to 2.0.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/98
* Updated default Helm version to 3.16.1 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/99
* Release 0.6.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/100

## What's Changed

* Allow helm to be used in a genrule by @kormide in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/79
* Update helm artifacts to use `integrity` by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/81
* Add support for `+` in package versions by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/82
* Release 0.4.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/83

# 0.2.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_helm",
    sha256 = "36594e2ba13f985cbba54e512aa85bb01f653914431c5c09dc8438fe184e21c2",
    urls = ["https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/releases/download/0.2.0/rules_helm-v0.2.0.tar.gz"],

```

* Updated default Helm version to 3.13.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/18

* Added a test rule to help ensure images are correctly resolved in packages by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/23
* Fixed image stamping with bzlmod by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/25
* Release `v0.0.5` by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/24
